mBits
About UsContributorsLicenseProjects

mBits is an initiative by the engineers at Mirafra Technologies. Our goal is to create a repository of high quality Verification IPs which are open-source and free to use.

All the VIPs will be developed with UVM following the best industry practices. They will come with comprehensive documentation and user guides. You can check the available VIPs on the Projects page.

All the code on in this repository is released under the permissive MIT License.

  • mbits@mirafra.com

    This is the project website for mBits - a repository of MIT-licensed open-source verification IPs.
